stem: Given question: A mail service will often drop packages off, but also do what with them? and answer: pick up, explain why in
no_more_50_words: A mail service can both drop packages off to customers (delivery), or pick them up from customers for mailing.
100_to_150_words: Mail services will often pick up packages as well as drop them off. This is essential to the mail service's functioning, as it allows customers to send packages without having to drop them off at the post office or other mail services themselves. This makes it much more convenient for customers and allows the mail service to serve a wider range of people. It also allows the mail service to keep track of packages and deliveries and make sure that everything gets where it needs to go. Pick up services are often free or included with other mail service fees, making them an important part of the customer experience.
